listing.listing_description: Villa Miramar is located in the heart of Tulum’s famous Caribbean coast, one and a half miles south of the historic Mayan ruins. The point at which the surf breaks directly in front of the grand palapa room offers the best snorkeling in Tulum. Sit in the cool water of your private swimming pool and count the rolling ocean waves as they turn from blue to green. It’s all about the sun, the surf and the azure sky at this contemporary oceanfront beach house.The breezy, sun-drenched palapa creates the perfect atmosphere for quiet contemplation, romance or entertaining friends, family or business associates. Enjoy oceanfront views, or take a dip in the swimming pool while entertaining guests with a barbeque cook-off. Your villa provides a cocktail deck, patio with lounge area, alfresco shower, lounge chairs, sound system and iPod dock. Enjoy a dining area for twelve, perfect for any kind of dinner party.With popping pink accents and rich wooden decor, you’ll feel immersed by this Mexican palace. The deluxe kitchen at Villa Miramar includes a white marble breakfast bar and stainless steal luxury appliances. Create a meal in the most elegant atmosphere. Lounge in the living room in the circular couch and enjoy spectacular ocean views. With the glass doors open, you have a balanced atmosphere of indoor and outdoor living.With five king bedroom suites, all with private en-suite bathrooms, Villa Miramar can accommodate ten guests in great comfort and style. Enjoy a private palapa and ocean view in the master bedroom. Fine linens and accoutrements provided splendid nights of rest with nothing but the sounds of ocean waves as your soundtrack.Villa Miramar is a vacation home that will provide you with a treasure trove of memories. Combining the mystery of the ancient civilization which inhabited this zone with the singular beauty of the Caribbean Sea that bathes its shores, this trip to Mexico is sure to be one for the books! Activities are endless including the Mayan Ruins, cenotes, eco parks, snorkeling, scuba diving or swimming with dolphins. Villa Miramar is a peaceful haven and the perfect place to celebrate something special!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

listing.listing_description: Little could be more invigorating than beach fun and tennis on the sunny island of Anguilla. Zenaida Estate offers both brilliant activities right at your fingertips! This resplendent villa is located in the coveted area of Sandy Hill and is nestled on three acres of lush tropical gardens with sweeping views of the Caribbean Sea and the mountains of St. Martin and St. Barths. Come get the rest and relaxation you deserve at this bijou villa!Zenaida Beach and Tennis Estate comprises three pavilions – ‘Flamboyant,’ ‘Loblolly’ and ‘Garden Cottage.’ Enjoy a swim in the infinity pool overlooking the aquamarine and azure hues of the ocean. Zenaida Estate also offers the only Har-Tru soft tennis court in the Leeward Islands. The court is well lit for playing in the cool of the tropical nights. The pièce de résistance of Zenaida, however, is no doubt the mile stretch of Anguilla’s famous powder-white sand beach right in your backyard. When you step out of the ocean, an open air hot tub and a delightful BBQ area await your whims. Perhaps some alfresco dining tonight?Asian antiques and chic contemporary furniture populate the interior spaces of Zenaida. The main living area features double-story ceilings and generous openings to the sea view. The gourmet kitchen features stainless steel appliances and a center island with a breakfast bar. Your reservation at Zenaida Estate includes a full staff with housekeeping, manager and security as well as complimentary continental breakfasts.Seven immaculate bedrooms accommodate up to fourteen guests at Zenaida Estate. All of the bedrooms feature king beds, en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning. Fine linens and comfortable beddings provide splendid nights of rest. Wake up to crystal clear mornings and nothing but the sounds of ocean waves as your soundtrack!With over 30 beaches, gourmet beachfront restaurants, a relaxed lifestyle and friendly people, Anguilla has become a renowned destination for the sophisticated traveler. Scuba diving, deep-sea fishing, wind surfing, sailing, horseback riding and world class spa facilities are all available within a few minutes of Zenaida Estate. Perfect for families, groups of friends or corporate retreats, come experience the laid back island tempo and warm hospitality that have made this area of the Caribbean so desirable.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This architectural gem in Costa Rica is located directly on Santa Teresa Beach, a fabulous destination famous for its surf waves, pristine sands, and delicious cuisine. Steps from the heart of town, Casa Teresa offers an ideal alternative to the region's hotels and resorts, featuring exquisite Spanish Colonial charm and artistry, exceptional amenities, and ample space for relaxation in total privacy. Four king bedroom suites with ensuite bathrooms accommodate families, destination wedding guests, corporate retreats, and groups of friends up to eight in size.Expansive outdoor living areas form the perfect haven for festive gatherings, special occasions, or inspired relaxation. Bask in the tropical sunlight or the dappled shade of lush trees, and dip into the pool for a refreshing swim. Step directly from the property onto the pristine sands of Playa Santa Teresa, and plunge into the luminous sea. Savor a siesta in the canopied bed and sip delicious fruit juice in the lounge. Relish alfresco meals on the veranda or at the large picnic table in the yard. Then admire the sublime sunset from the ocean's edge, and linger outdoors amid the enchanting nighttime lighting.Sliding glass doors open from the veranda to the villa's interiors, breathing the ocean air into the home. The kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and a fabulous marble wet bar, easily serving the various living and dining areas. Beautiful details like the arched front door, vaulted foyer, and blue-tiled interior fountain cast an enchanting spell of antique Spanish America.All four bedroom suites feature comfortable king beds, TVs, air conditioning, and ensuite bathrooms. Two open to the side yard, and two open directly to the pool and beach, with lovely ocean views. The superb master suite includes a walk-in closet and deluxe ensuite bathroom with dual vanity and both indoor and outdoor showersSanta Teresa has been hailed as the "next Tulum" by the New York Times and an "idyllic, healthy oasis" by Vogue. A short walk from the town's main drag, you're within minutes of some of the finest nightlife spots, seafood restaurants, eco-adventures, and watersport venues in the region. The wonderful town and beach of Carmen are just seven minutes away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Idyllically positioned amidst the sparkling white sands and aquamarine waters of Rendezvous Bay in Anguilla, Arushi Villa brings private luxury to this spectacular and natural Caribbean paradise. As part of the five-star Cuisinart Resort, you will also have access to most of its marvelous facilities and services including the famous Gregg Norman golf course that’s just steps away.Arushi Villa’s pristine white exterior contrasts dramatically with Anguilla’s flawless cerulean blue skies. This modern and luxurious escape successfully combines thoughtfully designed indoor and outdoor living areas to provide you with perfect seclusion and relaxation. Your villa’s extensive amenities include an immaculate fully-equipped kitchen and dining area, a private heated pool and hot tub, al fresco dining facilities and the security and comfort that you are part of an exclusive gated community. For your convenience, all butler and concierge services are included in one simple rate.You’ll enjoy pampering and privacy with the five-star amenities of the exclusive Cuisinart Resort at your service, which include its fitness center and tennis courts. And for golf lovers, Anguilla’s famous 18-hole Gregg Norman golf course is right on your doorstep. There really is something special for everyone when you stay at Arushi.Arushi Villa’s five elegantly appointed master suites all include luxurious marble bathrooms and air conditioning throughout, ensuring you and your guests needs are all well looked after. All you need to do is relax and envelop yourself in Arushi’s restful ambience.At Arushi you can truly savor the experience of the perfect luxury tropical getaway that’s surrounded with lush natural beauty. You will also receive exceptional private service and access to the many amenities provided by the 5-star Cuisinart Resort and Spa. Safely and privately located within its gated community, it’s just a 9.1 km drive to The Valley, a 10.3 km drive to the hospital, just 3.4 km to the Blowing Point Ferry Terminal and a 8.9 km drive to Clayton J. Lloyd International Airport (AXA).Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: An infinity pool laps at the terrace at this villa in a gated community at Las Terrenas. Clean-lined architecture clad in creamy stone is the backdrop to 360-degree panoramas of lush hills and the Atlantic Ocean. It’s a 10-minute walk through the quiet residential neighborhood to a sandy beach, or a 10-minute drive down a private access road to bars and restaurants by the water. Caribbean sunshine floods outdoor living spaces with an infinity pool and loungers, but there are also shaded al-fresco sitting areas, as well as a barbecue and a dining table for 8. Find your new favorite rum by mixing cocktails at the indoor wet bar, keep up with your favorite shows on the Apple TV, and share photos of your holiday with friends and family at home via Wi-Fi. Floor-to-ceiling glass and slide-away walls connect the indoor great room to the outdoor living spaces—and show off the ocean views, too. White sofas and a blond-wood dining table lend the ambience of a luxury spa to the living and dining areas, and the adjacent kitchen is fully equipped. For your comfort, this vacation rental also has ceiling fans and air conditioning. Villa Elroca has 4 bedrooms with king beds and one bedroom with a queen bed; all 5 bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and ocean views. Like the great room, the bedrooms have a monochromatic look that creates a restful feel, with plenty of pale stone and blond wood. The Dominican Republic is known for white-sand beaches right out of a honeymoon ad, and a stay at Villa Elroca puts you just a 10-minute walk from the nearest one. You can also choose to walk to the community’s 3 tennis courts or drive to downtown Las Terrenas to check out locally owned restaurants or socialize at the waterfront bars. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Thanksgiving 2019 promotion available for 3 or 4 bedroom bookings. Includes daily breakfast & housekeeping, roundtrip transfer from St. Maarten, Thanksgiving dinner at villa and car rental cost of up to $300 (insurance and license not included). Must book between now and November 19th, 2019.Located on spectacular Shoal Bay East in the idyllic island paradise of Anguilla, Villa Black Pearl offers privacy, relaxed elegance and exquisite views. Just steps to one of the Caribbean’s most beautiful beaches, you will be perfectly positioned for the ultimate Caribbean holiday. Allow the vibrant colors and divine serenity of this magical spot to melt your cares away.This tropical villa features a unique Mediterranean design including a domed roof and a barrel roof, as well as verandahs and pergolas throughout, allowing you to enjoy indoor/outdoor living to its fullest. While relaxing in any one of these areas, you will find solitude combined with a stunning panorama. The large outdoor living area is an ideal spot to toast the magnificent sunset, listen to the sounds of the sea and perhaps share a special announcement with your loved ones or entourage. During the day, laze about with the flotation devices in the heated swimming pool. From a gas grill, to alfresco showers and a roof deck bar with a gazebo, Villa Black Pearl aims to make this trip to Anguilla one for the books!The indoor spaces at Villa Black Pearl are large and airy with ceiling fans and custom furniture fabricated in Thailand. Natural shell stone floors, rich kabukali and cherry woods and natural Anguilla stone walls contribute to the palatial and modern feelings embodied by the design and decor of this fabulous villa. Top-of-the-line fixtures and the finest amenities round out this villa’s chic Caribbean style.Four exquisite and stately bedrooms accommodate up to eight guests at Villa Black Pearl. All of the bedrooms feature en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning, ceiling fans and media centers. You will find a variety of sleeping arrangements for everyone in the family. Your reservation includes housekeeping and a villa manager who will do everything to make your stay comfortable and carefree.An oasis of privacy and serenity right next to the luminous white sands of Shoal Bay Beach along a manicured seaside path – what more could you ask for this vacation? Just a short walk from some excellent restaurants and minutes from town and golf, when the day comes to pack your bags, you will wonder where all the time went. This feeling has made Villa Black Pearl a popular repeat destination for our distinguished guests. Your vacation, your way!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This custom-designed home is one of our most unique Barbados villa rentals—it’s shaped like a crescent, allowing you to see panoramic sea views from every room. With a perfect climate, stretches of amazing beaches and a unique culture, the island of Barbados offers visitors a memorable tropical getaway.Indulge in the quiet serenity of the manicured back gardens that feature a fountain and swaying palm trees, or lounge on the pool deck on one of the cushioned chaises surrounded by stunning sea views. The large infinity-edge pool seems to almost blend into the turquoise waters of the sea ahead.Inside, this estate boasts an open-air concept and views of the sea, and it is tastefully decorated with soft furnishings, marble floors and calming, neutral tones with pops of colour. The living room features cozy seating, high ceilings, and access to a large patio overlooking the garden and pool. A dining room offers soaring ceilings, a table with seating for up to eight, large doors with sea views and a small tropical garden. Meanwhile, the bright kitchen is fully equipped with Miele appliances and has French doors leading out to the back garden.The home allows up to eight guests, and has four bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms and sea views. The master bedroom on the northern tip of the home features vaulted ceilings, a soaking tub and a private terrace through double French doors. Two other bedrooms are in the same wing, one being able to connect with the master, and the final, queen-sized bedroom is found on the far end of the home.From here, you’ll be close to Holetown’s high-end shopping mall as well as some of the island’s top restaurants, and museum hopping can be done in the historic Speightstown, only a 10-minute drive away. Don’t forget to take in plenty of beach time—Sandy Lane beach is just 4.8 km from the property.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Gorgeous Villa Solemar is a wonderfully tranquil haven for relaxing and exploring Ambergris Cave, the largest island of Belize located northeast in the beautiful Caribbean Sea.At Villa Solemar the morning greets you with a spectacular sunrise beyond the azure Caribbean Sea. Comfortable and elegantly casual for guests of all ages, the interior of Villa Solemar highlights the talent of local craftsmen and artists. The fully equipped gourmet kitchen contains all you need to create an extra special island meal or tropical drink to be enjoyed on the spacious poolside verandah. It’s the perfect setting to watch the sunrise over the reef as you enjoy your morning coffee or a place to linger in the evening for stargazing. Your verandah allows instant access to the beautiful pool accented with tropical planters.When the sun goes down, browse through the DVD selection and relax in front of one of the flat-screen televisions, borrow a book from the shelf, or settle at the large dining table for a game of cards or some great dining and conversation. Whether your vacation includes quality time with family or a celebration with friends, Villa Solemar offers a memorable retreat where you can appreciate the magic of Belize.The three bedrooms, each with a king size bed, celebrate the natural diversity of Belize with hand-carved headboards and artwork representing the island, the reef, and the rainforest. A full size futon and queen sofa bed provide additional sleeping options to accommodate parties of up to eight guests.San Pedro Town is the only town on the island and is 3 miles away. It’s 1 mile to the tennis and basketball courts. From the beautiful azure waters of the Caribbean, to the Maya Mountains and the Pine Ridge, Belize has an adventure for everyone. Home to the second largest coral reef in the world, it’s a hub for snorkel or scuba diving. The reef lies one-half mile east of the Ambergris Caye shoreline and runs the entire 25-mile length of the island._ Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach. _Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located in the lush oceanside community of Manuel Antonio, this airy Costa Rican villa is the perfect escape for beach-bound vacationers. Surrounded by lush, tropical jungle, Villa Perezoso exists in unprecedented privacy, despite its proximity to beaches, nature reserves, and the shops, bars, and restaurants of Quepos Town. With five luxurious ensuite bedrooms, spacious common areas, and a scenic balcony, Perezoso has plenty of lounge space and vantage points for your group of twelve.Inside, Villa Perezoso is designed and decorated in relaxing Balinese style. Perfect for inviting fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight to flow freely within, Perezoso’s open-concept layout features numerous openings to the balcony’s jungle and ocean view. Always the consummate host, Perezoso features two fully equipped kitchens, formal dining for ten, and a penthouse loft area that is perfect for group gatherings. The decor is a relaxing mix of Balinese inspired art, designer furniture, and locally inspired accent pieces. And, Perezoso comes with Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and cable television to keep guests cool and connected.Outside, you’ll love cooling off on hot afternoons in Perezoso’s refreshing swimming pool. At night, rejuvenate in the hot tub while you count the stars. You’ll also appreciate the many sun loungers, alfresco dining, barbecue, and furnished lounge areas outside on the ocean-view balcony.With four pristine beach areas just minutes from home, you’ll have no trouble finding the perfect secluded spot to work on your tan. Tulemar, Espadilla, Playitas, and Biesanz beaches are all under two-kilometers from Villa Perezoso’s hillside perch. If you’d like to explore Costa Rica’s natural jungle habitat and learn a little about its local flora and fauna, the Manual Antonio National Park is a beautiful place to spend an afternoon. Travel a little further, and you’ll find the town of Quepos, rich with local boutique shops, delicious cuisine, and the Quepos Tennis Club if you’re up for a match.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Find the perfect pairing of private house and five-star amenities at Tradewinds. A holiday at this luxury estate gives you attentive service by a full staff and access to the Half Moon Resort—all in a beautiful residence with five bedrooms. Reserve this Montego Bay vacation rental for a relaxed family gathering or a golf getaway with friends.Your stay at Tradewinds includes the services of a chef, butler, housekeeper and even a chauffeur for week-long trips. After your arrival, you’ll be greeted with Club Mobay VIP service and whisked to the villa on a complimentary airport transfer. Once at the estate, the infinity pool, outdoor lounging and dining areas, al-fresco wet bar and barbecue are all yours to enjoy. There’s also an Apple TV, Sonos sound system, foosball table and Wi-Fi.Take in views over the golf course to the coast of Jamaica from breezily sophisticated living and dining rooms inside the villa. Dark-wood furniture and roll-arm sofas add refinement to the open-concept space, while tropical prints are a playful touch. Though chef service is included in your stay, there is a fully equipped kitchen.There are three bedrooms in the villa’s main house and two in a cottage; all five have en-suite bathrooms. In the main house, you’ll find two bedrooms with king beds and one bedroom with a queen bed. Both cottage bedrooms have king beds and al-fresco showers, making it perfect as a honeymoon-style retreat for a couple or a quiet spot for a family traveling with younger children.Golfers, rejoice: a stay at Tradewinds even includes complimentary membership to the Half Moon, White Witch and Cinnamon Hill golf courses—some of the best on Jamaica. Everyone else can relax by the pools and hot tub, check out the tennis courts and putting green, or order cocktails from the beach butlers at nearby Half Moon Resort.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: A postcard-worthy panorama of white sand and turquoise water is only one of Alta Vista’s many charms. This idyllic Playa del Carmen vacation rental offers captivating Caribbean Sea views, chic and spacious living areas, and a great location only minutes from the beach and the lively La Quinta neighborhood. Bring up to sixteen friends or family members for a memorable holiday in the Riviera Maya.There’s plenty of sunshine to soak up on Alta Vista’s two private outdoor living and dining areas: one in the lower-level courtyard and one on the rooftop terrace, which also features a plunge pool. Switch on the sound system for entertainment and linger outside for a little stargazing or finish the evening indoors around the pool table or Apple TV.The villa’s central great room is large enough for everyone to gather and enjoy the luxury of being together. Polished tile floors are cool underfoot, while stone columns separate the open-concept sitting area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen. Woven chairs, natural-fiber rugs and sculptural accent pieces add interest amid the modern furnishings.The eight bedrooms at Alta Vista have a variety of accommodations, but all have en-suite bathrooms. Relive your honeymoon in one of the four bedrooms with king beds, sleep with children nearby in one of two bedrooms with two queen beds, or let kids have their own space in the two bedrooms with two full beds each.From the villa’s terraces, it seems like the sandy beach and warm turquoise water are at your doorstep, and indeed, Playacar Beach is only a 1-minute walk away. For shopping and dining or a night out, head to La Quinta (Fifth Avenue), a 12-minute walk from Alta Vista, or make the 10-minute drive into central Playa del Carmen. Golf devotees can choose between the Hard Rock course, 5 minutes away, and the El Camaleon course at Mayakoba, 25 minutes away.Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located right on the beachfront in Fitt’s Village, this Caribbean luxury villa enjoys endless ocean views from its scenic terrace. With five ensuite bedrooms, all with king beds, Nirvana is perfect for a family vacation, a getaway with friends, or high-end corporate retreat. Nearby, you’ll have quick and easy access to Barbados best golf, natural wonders, shopping, nightlife, and more.Nirvana’s sleek and stylish interiors are highlighted by warm natural colors and elegant chandeliers, creating an ideal atmosphere for any occasion. Both the living and dining rooms feature wide openings to the terrace and breathtaking ocean views. For an even better view, head upstairs to the rooftop wet bar, a setting that is sure to inspire fond memories. And, for casual dinner and drinks, the alfresco dining set and lounge on the terrace allow the endless ocean view and fresh breeze of the Caribbean to set a soothing tone.Inside, you’ll appreciate Nirvana’s satellite and cable television, integrated sound system, Wi-Fi, and air conditioning. The fully equipped kitchen and barbeque are sure to inspire culinary creativity. Out on the terrace, the swimming pool, furnished lounge, sun chairs, and beachfront provide everything you need to fall in love with Barbados. And, the villa comes with housekeeping and chef service.With your own beachfront just steps away, you’ll have no trouble enjoying the beautiful environment and turquoise waters of the Caribbean. If you’d like to explore more of Barbados beaches, you’ll find Paradise, Paynes Bay, and the legendary Sandy Lane, all within three kilometers of home. If you’re in the mood to shop, dine out, or enjoy some vibrant Caribbean nightlife, the downtown areas of nearby Holetown and Bridgetown are both easily accessible. And, for the golfers, the Royal Westmoreland course is the best on the island.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Take a tropical vacation with hacienda flair at Villa Mariposa. Set on a hill outside Nosara and looking out to the forest and Pacific Ocean, this luxury Costa Rica vacation rental has beautiful views. Reserve the four-bedroom villa for a relaxed warm-weather holiday, or book it with the neighboring Casa Colibri to host a memorable family reunion or intimate destination wedding amid lush scenery.The villa is surrounded by a covered porch with sitting and dining areas perfect for reading, napping or just sitting with a cocktail in the balmy breeze. There’s an infinity pool that seems to stretch into the treetops and a private garden for your exclusive use. Listen to birdsong along with your breath at the yoga platform between Villa Mariposa and the neighboring casa, or inquire about using the shared soccer field and tennis courts.Traditional stucco walls and a tiled roof open to a gracious open-plan living area. Wrought-iron chandeliers and beamed ceilings have a bit of hacienda style, while streamlined banquette seating and wicker chairs are comfortable and modern. The spacious, fully equipped open kitchen pairs its own chandelier with rich-toned wood cabinets, stainless steel appliances and a convenient breakfast bar.Villa Mariposa has four air-conditioned bedrooms one with a king bed, and three with queens; two have ensuite bathrooms and two share a bathroom. A daybed in the master bedroom, and another in a main room/hall means the property can accommodate up to ten guests, if necessary. With floral bedding, high ceilings, and charming mullioned windows, the bedrooms are cozy and cheerful.A location just outside the town of Nosara puts Villa Mariposa within easy reach of beaches and restaurants where you can enjoy everything from a quick local snack to a honeymoon-worthy dinner. It’s a 10-minute drive into Nosara, a 15-minute drive to the nearest beach, Playa Pelada, a 20-minute drive to the famous surfing beach of Playa Guiones and a 35-minute drive to the turtle nesting sites on Playa Ostional. Plan to fly into the airports in San Juan, Liberia, or Nosara, or ask to land your helicopter right on the property’s shared soccer field.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Paraiso offers you sumptuous luxury and style in the impeccable beachfront oasis of Belizean Cove Estates, overlooking Ambergris Caye in the magical Caribbean.Welcome to Villa Paraiso, where your day starts with the spectacular sunrise beyond the dazzling Caribbean Sea. Spacious and opulently finished Villa Paraiso is resplendent in cream with pillared fittings, high ceilings and marble finishes. Colorful and exotic artwork by local artists adorns the walls and provides interesting and striking highlights. Comfortable yet elegantly furnished, a main feature of Villa Paraiso is its large living space where you can really enjoy family time. Opening up the French doors you enter your private terrace and beyond the lush and stunning pool area. Why not take a dip or take some time out in the hot tub? If you’d prefer to feel the sand between your toes, the beach is just a short stroll from this luxurious pool area. From here you can also take out a sea kayak and go exploring the sparkling Caribbean.In the evening head inside and browse the DVD collection. Relax in front of one of several flat-screen televisions, curl up with a good book or prepare a meal in your fully equipped kitchen and entertain friends or family in the spacious dining area that seats six.After a hard day relaxing, your three restful and luxurious bedrooms await! All feature opulent marble bathrooms for your utmost comfort. Decorated with colorful local artwork and floral bedding they’ll envelop you in the vibrancy and tranquility of the Caribbean. The master bedroom offers a king size bed and adjoining spacious bathroom with shower, whirlpool tub and double sinks. The second bedroom is ideal for families with young children with its queen bed and twin day bed. Enjoying its own separate entrance leading out to the garden, the third bedroom is furnished with a king size bed.Villa Paraiso is the perfect location to appreciate the magic of Belize. The only town on the island, San Pedro Town, is just 3 miles away, and you can also visit the tennis and basketball courts that are just one mile away. The island is home to the famous coral reef, second largest in the world, and runs the length of the whole island. The airport is just 5.5 km away._ Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach. _Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Greatview is perched on a lush hillside at Montego Bay on the north shore of Jamaica, with majestic, panoramic views of the Caribbean Sea. Practically a private resort unto itself, the villa features two swimming pools and fabulous amenities for dining, relaxation, wellness, and play. The friendly and skilled staff will enhance your experience, whether by preparing delicious meals, hosting the on-site Kids' Club, or driving you on excursions in the villa's private passenger van. Your vacation rental additionally includes access to the world-class Half Moon Luxury Resort and the golf courses at White Witch and Cinnamon Hill.The terraced estate offers expansive spaces for admiring the enchanting vistas and savoring the outdoor lifestyle of Jamaica. Two pool terraces (one with hot tub as well) and plentiful lounge chairs invite you to bask in the Caribbean sun and breeze, while spacious lanais and verandas welcome alfresco meals and cocktails in the soothing shade. The upper-floor balconies enjoy extraordinary prospects, and there is even a telescope for stargazing. Kids will delight in the log cabin tree house perched amid sea grape and orchid trees, with its own playground and indoor living area.The villa's spectacular interiors include a cavernous great room with two-story ceilings, French doors opening to the veranda, and a superb dining area and salon. Game tables and high-end entertainment equipment inspire light-hearted downtime and festive nights, and there is a well-appointed exercise room overlooking the forest and sea. The main house is wheelchair accessible and the entire villa enjoys air conditioning.All of the bedroom suites include ensuite bathrooms (two of which feature jetted tubs), and several of the rooms enjoy sublime views. The Plantation Green Room includes a beautiful king bed, a jetted tub in its bathroom, a private sitting area, a built-in entertainment system, and an outdoor shower. The Cottage includes two twin beds (or a split king), a sleeper sofa suitable for a child, and a small kitchen.Half Moon Luxury Resort is within easy reach and offers world-class amenities including a superb championship golf course, 3.2 km of beachfront, an extraordinary spa, and the award-winning Sugar Mill restaurant. The villa is also just ten minutes from Montego Bay and its international airport.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Discover a Bahamas hideaway that will make you believe in magic at Unicorn Cay. This one-of-a-kind vacation rental was built by Rosita Forbes, a famed writer and explorer who traveled widely throughout north Africa and the Middle East before settling on Eleuthera Island. The four-bedroom house was inspired by a French chateau and commands 12 acres of private grounds and nearly 500 feet of pink-sand beach. And today, it welcomes not just adventurers, but those looking to unwind and reconnect with friends and family.Take in the views from the shaded verandas and patios lining the house, or relax in the sunny central courtyard on a lounger or sun bed by the pool. There’s a barbecue where you can prep local specialties and an al-fresco dining table where you can enjoy them. Kayaks, stand-up paddleboards and snorkel equipment are provided for your use, and the villa has a golf cart you can take to the Unicorn Cay beach. In the evening, entertain inside around the hand-crafted walnut bar, spend a quiet moment in the library or keep up with favorite shows or games on the satellite TV.A gated entrance flanked by turrets sets the stately, European-inspired tone for this grande dame of Caribbean estates. It was recently restored to bring out the original features, from Abaco pine floors and woodwork to native stone, and add a touch of modern luxury—think gourmet appliances in the fully equipped kitchen. In the living and dining areas, built-in bookcases, coffered ceilings and a broad fireplace continue the feel of inviting elegance.Each of the property’s four bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom and opens onto the courtyard. There is one master suite with a king bed, two bedrooms with queen beds and one bedroom with two twin beds. The beautiful traditional interiors, which include details like four-poster beds and ornate chests, give the feeling of staying in someone’s country estate on holiday.The villa’s charms extend to its 470 feet of pink-sand beach, perfect for a honeymoon-style stroll or snorkeling on the nearby reefs. Its location near Governor’s Harbour is close to several fine restaurants, as well as the Edwin’s Turtle Lake Marine Preserve. For an easy day trip, drive to the ferry docks and ride over to Harbour Island for a few hours of exploration.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: For incredible sun and surf, treat yourself to a stay at Villa Floramar. Set amidst lush landscaping on surfing mecca Playa Negra, the four-bedroom villa offers luxe beachfront accommodations for both surfers and guests who’d rather stay on the beach. Two other beaches and a golf course within a short drive mean you’re never far from your next adventure.Slide open the wide glass doors from the great room to the covered terrace, which has spacious sitting and dining areas. A gazebo on one side is a quieter spot for reading or napping in the shade. Have a swim in the infinity pool just off the terrace, walk the 25 meters to Playa Negra, then rinse the sand off in the villa’s outdoor shower. For evening entertainment, the villa has cable television, and for convenience, there is a laundry room and a security system.The open-plan interiors of Villa Floramar feel breezy and comfortable with touches of European elegance, like a subtly patterned tile floor. Two cream-colored sofas in the great room’s sitting area offer plenty of seating, while a driftwood coffee table makes a dramatic centerpiece. The adjacent dining area seats eight in casual wicker chairs under a unique sculpted chandelier, and the fully equipped kitchen has both practical touches, like a breakfast bar and state-of-the-art appliances, and a pretty turquoise backsplash.One of the bedrooms at Villa Floramar is on the ground floor and the other three are upstairs; all are air-conditioned. On the ground floor, one of the two master suites has a king bed, open-air en-suite bathroom, terrace access and ocean views. Upstairs, the second master suite has a king bed, en-suite bathroom, walk-in closet and ocean views. The other two bedrooms have king beds and one has its own en-suite bathroom as well.Though Villa Floramar is located right on Playa Negra, it’s only 2 miles by car to Playa Blanca and just under 7 miles to Playa Avellana. Play a round at Hacienda Pinilla Golf Course, 7 miles away, and explore Santa Cruz, 22 miles away. Plan on a 50-mile drive from the villa to the Liberia airport or arrange an airport transfer at extra cost.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Its name meaning "take your time" in local patois, this superb villa invites you to disconnect and savor the enchanting beauty of Jamaica's north coast. The five-bedroom home is nestled amid lush gardens on a hilltop within the exclusive Rose Hall Estate, offering serene seclusion just steps from Cinnamon Hill Golf Course and a few minutes from the estate's beach club. Fabulous amenities for dining and entertainment include a pool terrace with bar and an ample veranda with alfresco dining. The private staff enhances every aspect of your stay with their warmth, expertise, and gourmet talents.Verdant gardens create an ambiance of tropical oasis under the open sky, while the villa's upper balconies gaze out on sweeping ocean views. A walkway leads through the forest to a charming gazebo perched above placid waters. Refresh you body in the hot tub and pool, and relish a delicious breakfast with Jamaican coffee on the patio in the morning light. Bathe in the afternoon sun on stylish lounge chairs, sipping hand-made drinks from the bar.The villa's main living area comprises an ample veranda and open-concept interior joined by broad pocket doors. Two alfresco lounges accompany a dining table made of a lovely glass pane perched atop an authentic tree trunk. The central living room leads to an interior dining room with French doors opening out to the garden and fountain. Upstairs, an additional salon opens to a furnished balcony—a fine setting for games or casual meals.All five bedrooms at Tek Time feature ensuite bathrooms, Televisions, and access to either a private balcony or terrace. Both of the master suites include king beds and deluxe bathrooms with dual vanities. The media room includes an additional sofa bed and ensuite bathroom. Air conditioning and ceiling fans complement the garden-scented breezes that circulate throughout the home.Tek Time is within walking distance of Cinnamon Hill Golf Course and a short drive of Rose Hall Beach Club, as well as the beach and golf club at Half Moon Resort. Sugar Mill Falls Water Park is also within minutes. With Sangster International Airport just thirteen kilometers away, Tek Time is an excellent choice for destination wedding guests.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Turquesa is pure heaven for anyone seeking a relaxed, upscale ambiance for a group retreat, family getaway or escape among friends. Discover this magnificent 9-bedroom estate perched cliffside, 150 ft above the turquoise Pacific, in exclusive Pedregal. Drink in breathtaking views of the ocean, Cabo’s famous beaches, and at night, watch the lights of this legendary Baja California oasis come alive around you.Your outdoor living spaces are a resort unto themselves. Float along in an infinity pool that features a full swim-up bar at one end. Bask in the sun from a soft chaise longue or retreat with friends under the large, thatched-roof lounge. Get active in the afternoons with a putting green challenge or shuffleboard tournament. Host a cocktail party in the evening, preparing fresh seafood on the built-in barbecue, as a fire crackles in the outdoor fireplace. Up to 60 people will enjoy dining outside as the sun sets over the horizon.Experience 15,000 sq ft of elegant splendor inside Villa Turquesa. Spacious rooms are adorned with cozy, contemporary lounge furniture and rustic accessories. Each room treats you to magnificent ocean views, and blend seamlessly into the outdoor spaces through pocket glass walls. Host movie night in the theater room or sweat it out in the full gym and sauna. The gourmet kitchen has enough premium appliances to feed a small army of famished guests. Spend a few quiet moments alone around the fireplace or in the charming library.Villa Turquesa’s nine spectacular bedrooms are spread among three floors, and a housekeeper is on-hand weekdays to help you maintain their beauty. The bedrooms contain either King and Queen beds, with the exception of the children’s room where you’ll find bunk beds leading out to a playground. Most rooms lead directly to outdoor spaces and all have private en-suites. The exquisite Master-suite displays ocean views and features its own spa-inspired en-suite and an al fresco shower.Cabo San Lucas is famous for its eco-diversity which can be explored by boat, car, foot or flipper. You’re a short walk away from the soothing shores of Pedregal Beach, while two other famous stretches of sand are within a 5 minute drive. From your villa you can see the rocky profile of Land’s End, but venture closer to witness the unique El Arco rock formation. Head into central Cabo and discover fine dining, traditional mexican fare, as well as nightlife options ranging from wild nights at Cabo Wabo to more sophisticated choices.NOTE : This villa can be rented as a 4BR/5BA rental. (Lowest floor containing 5 bedrooms, large home theater, putting green, children’s play area and shuffleboard court will be locked off.) This option offers 10,000 sq feet of indoor space and sleeps up to 12 persons.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: No. 6 Claridges Barbados is part of an exclusive boutique development of 10 exceptional villas set amongst two acres of lush, tropically landscaped gardens. Located in the heart of the Platinum West Coast only a few moments from the secluded, white sands of Gibbs Beach.Designed by renowned local architect Michael Gomes, these superbly constructed villas combine modern living with classic coral stone elegance and a hint of Balinese architectural influence. The finishes of each villa include handsome cedar, mahogany, marble, granite and travertine, each complementing the other, coming together to produce a natural, stylish contemporary living space that breathes sophistication and charm.No.6 Claridges is the epitome of contemporary living in the tropics. This two story, three bedroom townhouse boasts vibrant and exclusively customized decor. Your main entrance opens on to the living and dining room with a well equipped kitchen and then flows out directly to your large covered terrace. This extensive terrace area is opulently fitted with a comfortable day bed, personal sun loungers and umbrellas. Here you’ll enjoy lounging in complete comfort and privacy as your outdoor area is completely enclosed by tropical gardens. Your terrace is also where you’ll enjoy relaxed al fresco dining. No. 6 Claridges is very well equipped both inside and out, amenities include Apple TV, Sonos and Wi-Fi throughout, so all your needs are considered. This residential resort community features a large swimming pool with three dazzling waterfalls and there is also a private gazebo where you can soak up the brilliant year-round sunshine in a tranquil and peaceful setting.All bedrooms are en-suite with King sized beds, walk through closets and private terrace. One bedroom is located on the ground floor while the first floor houses the other two bedrooms. Additionally, the first floor has a multi functional den with a desk and flat screen television, offering you an ideal place for work or lounging.Claridges is a short walk to Gibbs Beach where you have exclusive beach service with beach chairs and umbrellas. South of Claridges, Holetown and Speightstown is just 10 minutes away allowing for easy access to amenities, restaurants and shopping. Grantley Adams International Airport (BGI) is 31 km away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Look out over Land’s End from Penasco. Set above the coast in the exclusive community of Pedregal, this Los Cabos vacation rental commands views of both sunrise and sunset, as well as Cabo San Lucas and the resorts along Solmar Beach. Invite up to fourteen friends or family members to join you in what feels like your own private boutique hotel on high.Your holiday at this luxury property includes daily American-style breakfast and housekeeping, along with the use of pool floats and beach towels. Take in the incredible views from the home’s heated infinity pool, which has a shallow area perfect for lounging, hot tub, or one of the lounge chairs on the terrace. As the sun begins to set, heat up the barbecue and settle in to the dining area under the pergola for the nightly show.Slide-away glass doors let the views be the star of the villa’s sleek modern rooms. Stretch out on the sectional in the living room and watch a parade of fishing boats round the El Arco rock formation or see if you can spot whales from the dining room. The gourmet kitchen is well equipped with state-of-the-art appliances and granite countertops. There’s also a separate fitness room and media room.Penasco is divided into two pavilions with three bedrooms each. The left pavilion has two bedrooms with king beds and one with two queen beds, while the right pavilion has two bedrooms with king beds plus an apartment with a queen bed that’s ideal for a couple wanting honeymoon-style privacy. All six bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.Though it feels like you have a bird’s-eye view over Baja, Penasco is within walking distance of the Pedregal tennis court and a 1-minute drive from the beach. Avid golfers won’t want to miss the chance to play at the nearest course, a 15-minute drive away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Brilliant blue waters and sugar-white sands are an incredible backdrop for the brand-new Alinna Villa. With five bedrooms on a single level, plenty of provided water sports equipment and a Chalk Sound location close to two popular beaches, it’s a wonderful destination for a beach holiday with extended family or a Turks and Caicos getaway with friends.Take in the stunning ocean views from outdoor living areas with a pool, hot tub, loungers, hammock and barbecue, or get close to the water on the provided kayaks and paddleboards. In the evenings, gather around the firepit or head indoors to enjoy the pool table, media room, cable TV and Wi-Fi. The villa also has a gym and office space so it’s easy to keep up with your routines.Fold-away glass doors lead from the villa’s sleek terrace to its breezy great room, where mid-century inspired sitting and dining areas and a fully equipped kitchen are laid out under a vaulted ceiling. Pops of turquoise in the artwork and fabrics echo the color of the sea outside, and the open-concept floor plan means there’s room for everyone.This luxury vacation rental has four honeymoon-worthy master suites with king beds and ocean views, including one with a private al-fresco shower. The fifth bedroom is set up for younger guests, with two sets of bunk beds and its own outdoor shower. All five bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.Thanks to its location on Chalk Sound, Alinna Villa is just steps from a bay that’s part of a national park, with several small islands within easy paddling distance. It’s a short drive from Sapodilla and Taylor Bay beaches, two of the most popular on the island for their relatively sheltered coves, as well as the pristine waters of Princess Alexandra National Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Adults and children alike will get a kick out of Villa Equinox. Perched on the coast of Sea Breeze Hills in Cap Estate, the villa has breathtaking ocean views as well as two pools and even a swim-up bar. Four suite-style bedrooms, spacious living areas with Caribbean flair, and cook service ensure you’ll stay in privacy and luxury.Start your day at Villa Equinox with breakfast on the veranda, then move to the adjacent sitting area, a lounge chair on the lawn, or one of several chaises on the pool terrace. The villa’s main pool has a freeform shape crossed by a bridge, a swim-up bar and views of the ocean just below. There’s also a more private plunge pool off the master suite. Prepare dinner on the barbecue, and in the evenings, gather around the television or browse the Internet for entertainment. With cook and housekeeping services included in your stay, all you have to do is relax.The villa is laid out around a long, airy living and dining room with vaulted ceilings, creamy stone floors and several pairs of French doors opening to the veranda. The living room’s wood-framed sofas have neutral-toned upholstery accented by palm-print pillows, and in the dining room, the same pairing of wood and beige upholstery has traditional Caribbean elegance. The fully equipped kitchen is all modern charm with pale wood cabinets and charcoal gray stone countertops.Each of the four bedrooms at Villa Equinox has an en-suite bathroom and air conditioning. There are two bedrooms with king beds, one of which has access to a private plunge pool, and two bedrooms with two twin beds each. As in the rest of the house, neutral walls and floors and dark wood furniture are set off by brightly colored bedding for a traditionally tropical feel.It wouldn’t be a vacation on St-Lucia without a day at the beach, so take time to explore the many nearby beaches only a short drive away. Reserve a tee time at Championship Golf Course, a 3.5 km drive from the villa, and discover local fare in the towns of Gros Islet, just over 5.5 km away, and Rodney Bay, 6.5 km away. From Villa Equinox, it’s about a 16 km drive to the island’s George F.L. Charles Airport.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This is one of the few exclusive Four Seasons Private Villas inside the gates of the prestigious Punta Mita Resort. Located on the lavish hillside above the posh Four Seasons Resort Punta Mita, the peaceful villa boasts vivid ocean views out to the Marietas Islands and the Pacific Ocean.Distinguished by a private infinity edge pool, spacious covered terraces, well-maintained patio areas, gourmet kitchen and an inviting four-bedroom design, Villa Vallarta-Punta Mita radiates Four Seasons quality and detailing. Masterfully carved antique Mexican wooden doors welcome you to your private courtyard entry, which reveals a villa that is a showcase for sophisticated, yet relaxed Mexican coastal architecture.Villa Vallarta Punta Mita is a charming Primavera Model: Two-level, four-bedroom, four plus one 1/2 bath villa, with a lush private pool, hot tub, and adjacent garage for one car plus golf cart. It encompasses 6,475 square feet of magnificent living areas, with 4,275 square feet of fresh air-conditioned space.Interiors feature design artistry, with touches that include furnishings and artwork from Mexicos finest artisans. Exquisite marble flooring, a generous use of discerning glass and radiant hardwood beams enrich your living experience.

listing.listing_description: Pamper yourself with aquatic options at this stylish beachfront villa on Playa Paraiso in the heart of the Riviera Maya. Sit back in the hot tub while the kids splash around in the pool. When you’re ready, step off the deck to the white sands of the beach or retreat the shade beneath one of the mature palm trees. After the beach, set out on an adventure in an underwater cave at Cenote Azul. Relax inside amongst the air conditioning and modern designer furnishings. The state of the art kitchen is sure to inspire your creative side. Pick up some fresh fish from a local market to barbecue on the terrace for taco night. The doors in the formal dining area can quickly turn the space into a refreshing alfresco setting for 8. After dinner, mix up some cocktails to sip on the terrace lounge.Turn up the sound system while you’re outside enjoying the ocean view, and let the night unfold, hopping in and out of the pool, walks along the shore, and late-night snacks on the barbecue. Rather a hangout inside? Throw the big game on the Smart TV or settle in for a family movie night. Villa Carrera comes with daily housekeeping to keep the space fresh, and there are 2 parking spaces within the gated-property.After a late breakfast, grab your camera and make the trip to Tulum Ruins, the ancient remains of the Mayan civilization. On the way home, stop in Puerto Morelos Reef National Park to try scuba diving or charter a fishing trip in town. At night, the beachfront party scene in Cancun is perfect if you feel like sipping cocktails in the sand and dancing way after the sun has gone down.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

listing.listing_description: Breathtaking natural scenery outside and local materials and artwork inside create a true sense of place at Villa Watina. Just steps from the golden sands of Ambergris Caye Beach and a short drive from the town of San Pedro, this oceanfront Belize vacation rental has a setting that’s both postcard perfect and convenient. Hand-crafted furniture and decor and three suite-style bedrooms create an ambience of thoughtful luxury for family getaways or beach holidays with friends.An array of shared pools and hot tubs is the only thing between Villa Watina and the Caribbean Sea. Swim a few laps there, stretch out in a lounge chair on the pool terrace or step down to the beach and borrow a sea kayak or stand-up paddleboard to take out on the water. If you’d rather explore on land, pedal one of the bicycles through the seaside landscape. In the evenings, the surround sound system, movie collection and Wi-Fi are sure to entertain.Stone floors, stately columns and beamed ceilings give the villa the elegance of a Tuscan country estate, but the furniture and artwork bring in Central American style. Wicker sofas, stools and side tables have relaxed natural texture, throw pillows add lively pattern and color and plenty of polished wood is a nod to the rainforests of Belize. Sit down to a memorable dinner at the formal dining area, or a more casual meal at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.Three bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms are inviting private retreats at the end of a day in the sun by the pool or exploring the area. The master bedroom is as well appointed as a honeymoon suite, with a king bed, jetted tub, ocean views and a balcony. The other two bedrooms each have queen beds; one opens to a balcony as well.Plan to fly into San Pedro Airport, 3.5 miles from Villa Watina, or Philip S.W. Goldson International Airport, 48 miles away. From the villa’s location on Ambergris Caye Beach, you can book a tour or diving expedition through Tuff E Nuff Tours, just over a half-mile away, get out on the tennis or basketball courts 1 mile away, or find shopping and dining in the town of San Pedro, 3 miles away. If you can’t get enough of the sand and warm water, it’s worth making a trip to X’Tan Ha Beach, 4.5 miles away, or Hol Chan Marine Reserve, 7 miles away._ Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach. _Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Read more about this villa in our magazine (http://magazine.luxuryretreats.com/the-secrets-out-on-ambergris-caye/)

listing.listing_description: This canal-side luxury home, located in the prestigious Leeward Settlement of Turks and Caicos, offers its guests the opportunity to enjoy instant access to the beautiful turquoise waters of the Caribbean. Perfect for a golf getaway, fishing trip, or a watersports adventure, Turks and Caicos have an incredibly serene atmosphere, yet plenty of opportunities to get out and enjoy a wide range of attractions. Nearby, you’ll find Provo Golf Club, Grace Bay Beach, and Leeward’s Main Street, which is lined with shops, restaurants, and nightlife establishments.Privacy is easy to find at White Coral, with its accommodations for twelve split between the four-bedroom Main House, and the two bedroom Guest House, all of which feature en-suite bathrooms. The open concept living area that runs alongside the terrace and canal is perfect for group gatherings. Decorated with elegant white marble, designer furniture, peaked ceilings, and plenty of openings to the terrace, the Great Room promotes a breezy, open-air atmosphere. Throughout the villa, you’ll find subtle splashes of color in the form of tropical greenery, bright textiles, and throw-pillows that add a touch of excitement to the classic white color scheme.White Coral is outfitted with formal and alfresco dining areas, a fully equipped kitchen, and a barbecue. Outside, you’ll love lounging in sun beds, beach chairs, and in the refreshing swimming pool as you watch the boats go by the canal. Back inside, you’ll appreciate air conditioning, television, a sound system, Wi-fi, and a washer/dryer. And, included with your reservation, you’ll receive airport transfer and daily housekeeping.When you’re ready to get out and do some exploring, you’ll find TCI Ferry and Caribbean Cruisin within a fifteen-minute walk. These services can connect you with other areas and islands in Turks and Caicos, as well as assist with your own charters, excursions, and jet ski rentals. Within a six-minute drive, you’ll be able to reach Grace Bay, Emerald, and Pelican beaches. And, if you’re really feeling adventurous, Turks and Caicos Kiteboarding are just five minutes from home.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Early birds and night owls alike will find their bliss at Windchat Villas. Made up of two villas, Sunrise and Sunset, this luxury oceanfront Bahamas vacation rental has exceptional views of the island and ocean, as well as 250 feet of gorgeous pink-sand beach. As another beautiful Caribbean day dawns over the eastern point of the island of Eleuthera, welcome the sun from one of the four bedrooms—two in each villa—and gather with friends and family during the day in the resort-worthy outdoor living areas.There’s plenty at Windchat Villas for guests of all ages (and activity levels). Down at the beach, have a swim in the warm water, take the kayaks or stand-up paddleboards out to explore or bring back honeymoon memories with a sunset stroll along the sand. Spot cruise ships from the porches, flip on the sound system as you stretch out in a lounger by the heated infinity pool or challenge everyone to shuffleboard, foosball, ping-pong or even tennis or basketball on the private court. When the sun begins to sink, rinse off in one of the outdoor showers and heat up the barbecue for dinner.Built in 1964 by a Pan American Airways executive and recently renovated, Sunrise was the original villa on the site; its counterpart, Sunset, was just finished. But although they differ in age, the two houses share open layouts, a breezy aesthetic and stunning views. Neutral walls, high ceilings and sand-colored tile floors form the base for furnishings in tropical hues of watery turquoise and palm-leaf green. Both villas have formal dining areas with ocean views and bright, fully equipped kitchens.Each of the two Windchat Villas has a master suite and one additional bedroom. In Sunrise, the master suite has a king bed, private hall bathroom and ocean views, and the second bedroom has two twin beds and an ensuite bathroom. There is also a sleeping loft available to accomodate two additional guests. In Sunset, all three bedrooms have an ensuite bathroom, and two bedrooms feature a balcony as well as ocean views. From the villas’ location on North Palmetto Point, you’ll have easy access to the island’s other standout beaches, attractions and airports. Book your ticket into Governor’s Harbor Airport, Rock Sound International Airport or North Eleuthera Airport. Once at Windchat Villas, you’re just a 13 km drive from French Leave Beach and within day-trip distance of Surfer’s Beach and Lighthouse Beach. Ask the villa manager if you need help organizing a snorkeling or fishing expedition, a horseback ride on the beach, or take a day trip to swim with the pigs on Exuma. Meet local fauna at Edwin’s Turtle Lake Marine Preserve, locals themselves at Governor’s Harbour, or marvel at the natural scenery of Ocean Hole, the Hatchet Bay Caves, the Glass Window Bridge and Preacher’s Cave. If you have time to see more of the Bahamas on your holiday, neighboring Harbour Island is 70 km away, and tiny Spanish Wells is 85 km away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Unwind Baja style at the charming contemporary Casa Naah Payil. This stylish Cabo del Sol vacation rental has everything you need for the ideal Los Cabos holiday: views of the Sea of Cortez; welcoming indoor-outdoor living spaces; and a location in The Corridor close to beaches, golf and more. Four bedrooms plus the option to use a fifth room mean you can soak up the Cabo sun with up to twelve friends or family members.Watch fishing boats and catamarans ply the ocean from the comfort of a private terrace with a heated pool, hot tub, lounging and dining areas, and a wet bar. As the sun sinks toward the horizon, heat up the barbecue and firepit and linger outdoors. Inside, you’ll find a TV and sound system, plus Wi-Fi and a wine fridge.Open on two sides to the terrace and a courtyard, the villa’s great room is bright and inviting. Natural wood and woven chairs lend organic appeal to the sitting area, while there’s plenty of room around the large dining table. Even the fully equipped kitchen has a breakfast bar where you can perch for the morning’s first coffee or an afternoon snack.This luxury property has two bedrooms with king beds, one bedroom with two queen beds and one bedroom with two double beds plus a bunk bed. Guests also have the option to use a fifth bedroom with a bunk bed. All five bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms.Casa Naah Payil is a short drive from swimmable Medano Beach, where you can play in the water or sample the cocktails and seafood at Tabasco, and from tennis courts and the nearest golf course. For lively restaurants and nightlife, head into Cabo San Lucas; for a gallery walk or quiet honeymoon-worthy dinner, drive into San Jose del Cabo.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Nestled within Gros Islet near the northern tip of St. Lucia, Xhale is a beautiful luxury villa featuring expansive views of the Caribbean Sea and Anse Galet Bay framed by verdant shoreline hills. With four bedrooms sleeping eight, it's the ideal vacation rental for destination wedding guests, groups of friends, and families seeking privacy and total comfort in this dreamy island paradise.The villa is perfectly designed to create seamless transitions between its indoor and outdoor spaces. A lovely terrace with infinity swimming pool and ocean views forms the villa's peaceful core, while the wraparound balcony includes additional lounge areas for plein air relaxation. In the afternoon, fire up the grill for some delicious seafood barbeque, and gather around the fire pit in the evening as cooler breezes blow.Sliding glass doors create an alfresco feel within the villa's living spaces, where the exquisite décor and furnishings echo the natural beauty of the island and sea. On one side of the pool terrace, an open-plan kitchen-and-dining area features an ocean-view table for eight and a luminous, fully equipped kitchen with breakfast bar. On the other side of the pool terrace, a spacious living room includes a large TV and sumptuous furnishings. These two wings are connected by an additional lounge and the gorgeous stone wall extending from the earth through both of the villa's levels. The villa also includes a well-equipped, ocean-view fitness room as well as a quiet office space.Xhale includes four beautiful bedrooms, all with ensuite bathrooms, private balconies, and ocean views. The master bedroom has a king size bed, and its bathroom features a stand-alone bath beside an ocean-view glass wall. The other three bedrooms all have queen beds. With exquisite décor and cozy bedding, the bedrooms are ideal for afternoon private time and nights of peaceful rest.Xhale provides an ideal location for exploring St. Lucia. You're just a short drive or bicycle ride to Plantation Beach, Pigeon Island Beach, and Reduit Beach, while the natural treasure of Pigeon Island National Park is only a few kilometers away. If you dream of Caribbean golf, St. Lucia Golf and Country Club is just minutes from your door.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Trunks sprout in the great room and leaves wave outside this treehouse-like villa in the Costa Rica jungle. Two terraces offer up forest and ocean views, and sliding teak and glass walls make the house feel as though it’s grown up out of the lush landscape. It’s a 3-minute walk through the trees to the surf break at Playa Guiones, whose sandy bottom and quieter vibe are well suited to beginners. This vacation rental beckons you outdoors with a deck stretching the width of the house, an infinity pool, loungers set in the sunshine, a barbecue, and covered sitting and dining areas facing the ocean. A second deck has its own sitting and dining spots. Wi-Fi keeps you connected to friends and family at home, air conditioning keeps you comfortable, and laundry facilities are there for your convenience. The walls of this luxury property have three layers: a teak panel, glass and a screen, which you can close for privacy or open to let the breezes flow through. The open-concept living room and fully equipped kitchen gets its warm, welcoming vibe from teak ceilings and floors, and tree trunks supporting the ceiling add to the fresh-from-nature feel. The casa has two bedrooms with king beds, including one with its own terrace and one with a honeymoon-suite-worthy balcony and al-fresco bathtub and shower. The third bedroom has a queen bed and a twin bunk bed. All three bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms. If you’ve ever wanted to surf, a Costa Rica holiday is the time—and with Playa Guiones a 3-minute walk from the villa, you can practice on your own whenever you want or book a lesson with Safari Surf School, 6 minutes away by car. If you’re visiting between July and November, drive to Ostional National Wildlife Refuge to watch olive ridley turtles come ashore to lay their eggs. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: C’est La Vie is its own little oasis on the Trouya Pointe peninsula, where privacy, peace and tranquility are only interrupted by bird songs and crashing of waves. Landscaped gardens completely surround the property highlighted by yellow, red, pink and gold flowers. The main house and its adjoining cottage and apartment are truly unique and reveal both traditional Caribbean as well as Balinese influences.The full-service villa team will make you feel like you are staying at your own private boutique hotel!Start each day on the upper veranda where a lounge set and breakfast table give you a perfect vantage points for your eyes to wander from ornate curved eaves to carved hardwood railings to the endless green landscape. Saunter down to the swimming pool and dip your head under the waterfall. Dry off on a chaise longue before retiring to the nearby daybed. Refresh yourself under the outdoor shower then join your guests at the Banana Bar or fire up the barbecue.There are several living rooms where you can all gather. Each one boasts soft sofas adorned with designer fabrics and surrounded by elegant antique wooden furniture, accessories and attractive louver windows. Enjoy meals in the dining area or one of several al fresco tables. A professional chef can also be retained to create gourmet feasts.C’est La Vie contains five of St. Lucia’s most exquisitely designed bedrooms, each named after a local tree and clad with designer fabrics, soft linens and exotic, tasteful furnishings. Three bedrooms are in the main home, all with a private veranda, en-suite bathrooms, including walk-in shower and air conditioning. A fourth room is found in the separate cottage also with en-suite bathroom, private veranda and a study. The final room is in a comfortably furnished apartment at pool level. Its en-suite houses a handmade soak tub.A short pathway leads from C'est la Vie to a tranquil, secluded cove from which snorkelers may search for reef fish or lobster and strong swimmers may circumnavigate the peninsula and find themselves in another quiet cove with a beautiful sandy beach. It can also be reached on foot in about five minutes; either cove is ideal for a picnic or a barbecue.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Windsong is a spectacular beachfront villa in Cabarete-Sosua, a world-class resort development along the Dominican Republic's northern coast. With a private, secluded beach and spectacular indoor and outdoor spaces, this four-bedroom luxury vacation rental offers exquisite privacy in the midst of paradise.Nestled in tropical gardens, Villa Windsong features a beautiful swimming pool and lush lawn leading directly onto the soft sands of Laguna Beach. Savor long days bathing in the ocean and playing your favorite water sports, then rinse off in the alfresco shower and sip fresh coconut water in the beachside gazebo. Returning from the beach, relax around the pool on loungers in the Caribbean sun or beneath talapia parasols, before withdrawing into a sumptuous lounge. Gather around the alfresco table for meals in the ocean breeze.Large sliding doors lead you from the pool terrace to the capacious, open-plan interior, filling your mornings and evenings with fresh air and light. Under beautiful, vaulted ceilings with exposed wooden beams, you'll sip cocktails together in the lovely lounge before gathering around the dinner table for epic feasts. Beside you, the spacious and fully equipped kitchen includes everything you need for memorable meals, and opens directly to an outdoor herb garden and barbeque grill. There is also a second living area, with a large and comfy sectional facing flat screen television, along with a full work desk. The villa's furnishings and décor are absolutely exquisite throughout, with an elegant naturalism that roots you gracefully in the island's precious natural beauty.The villa's four palatial bedrooms all feature king size beds, while three of the rooms additionally include two twin size beds, accommodating fourteen people in all—ideal for families and destination wedding guests. All of the rooms have balconies, ocean views, and gorgeous ensuite bathrooms, while three of the rooms have direct access to the terrace.Beyond the sanctuary of your villa and private beach, you're very close to the wonderful features that make Cabarete-Sosua one of the top destination in the Caribbean Islands. Ranch Horse Beach Club is just a short walk away, or you can take a short drive to the towns of Cabarete and Sosua for restaurants, night life, or more time at the beach.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located along Provo’s stunning Long Bay Beach, Pearl East is one of three homes within the Pearls of Long Bay Estate property. The perks at this luxury vacation rental have been set to overdrive for fun in the sun and pleasant repose. Get the rest and relaxation you deserve, next holiday, at this exclusive oceanfront property in the Turks and Caicos!The grounds at Pearl East include two swimming pools and a children’s wading pool. Or perhaps it’s time for a soothing soak in the therapeutic bubbles of the hot tub? Decked out for the consummate entertainer, you will also find the following: alfresco dining for eight, a pool bar, a Japanese teppanyaki cooking station, a barbeque, sun loungers, umbrellas, a beachside sound system and a children’s play set. The interiors of this elegant residence are equally impressive with a stunning home theater room with popcorn machine, cable TV, an indoor/outdoor sound system and other divertissements including Netflix, Apple TV and a DVD/Blu-ray player. Your reservation includes housekeeping, and a private chef.Pearl East offers guests uninterrupted views of the turquoise waters spanning the Caicos Banks while marrying contemporary design with Caribbean barefoot luxury. This stunning home seamlessly harmonizes the idea of indoor/outdoor living with beautiful landscaping, decks and lagoons throughout for 12,000 square feet of sophisticated living. High vaulted ceilings and plenty of overhead fans keep the feelings airy and breezy.Eight exquisite bedroom suites accommodate up to twenty guests at this non-smoking villa. Access to the outdoors is a breeze! All of the suites offer dual vanities, televisions, Netflix and Apple TV. Sleep soundly with nothing but the ocean waves as your soundtrack!Pearl East shares first class amenities reminiscent of a five star resort with the other homes at this estate. Continue your workout regime in the state of the art 1,000 square foot gymnasium or get together for some tennis on the championship court. Relax in the Turkish steam bath, sauna or alfresco massage pavilion. The Provo Golf Club is also just a few minutes away. Pearl East is ideal for a group of family or friends and can even serve as the locale for a dream wedding or a decadent honeymoon!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: With its gorgeous beachfront location, charming colonial-style architecture and range of luxury amenities, Hacienda Corazon is a Riviera Maya vacation rental after your heart. Reserve its ten bedrooms for a getaway with up to twenty friends or extended family, or book with its two sister villas to host a family reunion, milestone celebration or destination wedding for up to 250 guests.Your holiday at Hacienda Corazon includes the services of a gourmet chef, villa manager, butler and housekeeper. After you’ve finished your welcome refreshments, get down to relaxing and playing with the help of the heated pool, al-fresco living and dining areas, outdoor sound system and barbecue. There’s also a games room inside, along with a choice of video games, a satellite television, a wine cooler and Wi-Fi.Inspired by traditional Mexican estates, the residence is laid out around a tranquil central courtyard. Follow the arched doorways into inviting living and dining areas with intricate tilework, vibrant fabrics and sleek furnishings. The hacienda has four bedrooms with king beds, three bedrooms with two queen beds each, and three bedrooms with two twin beds, which can be combined into king beds if desired. All ten bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning, and several have ocean views or open to a terrace.Set off from Hacienda Corazon in the provided kayaks or atop the paddleboards to explore the bay just in front of the house. From the villa’s location in the exclusive Puerto Aventuras community, it’s also a 15-minute drive or less to the golf and tennis club and downtown Playa del Carmen. For a memorable day trip, make the 30-minute drive to the Tulum ruins or the 45-minute drive to Tulum itself and find out why it’s becoming a trendy honeymoon destination.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

listing.listing_description: Villa Del Mar is an exquisite luxury home at Playa del Carmen, situated just steps from the beach within the Playacar Phase One gated community. The superbly appointed residence includes two terraces, high-end amenities for dining and entertainment, and a talented staff, while its prime location offers serene privacy within walking distance of myriad activities. With accommodations for ten guests, Villa del Mar forms an ideal haven for families and groups of friends seeking comfort, style, and convenience in this gem of the Riviera Maya.The home evokes the elegance of Old Mexico, with its luminous white facades, terracotta rooftop, and columns of weathered stone. The lower terrace features a swimming pool traversed by a delightful marble footbridge leading to the main entrance. Ample sitting areas invite you to bask in the Caribbean sunlight or relax in the cool shade, and there is an excellent rustic grill for barbeque cooking. In the evening, gather on the rooftop terrace for alfresco meals, delicious drinks, and soothing hot tub soaks while gazing at the dreamy sea.The main interior living room (off the pool terrace) features peaked ceilings with rich wood beams, abundant natural light, and exquisite décor blending modern comfort with antique charm. A fully equipped kitchen with chef-grade appliances and a marble bar serves a beautiful wooden dining table for eight. Downstairs, the wonderful party room is like a deluxe cantina, with a full bar, billiard table, wine cellar, lounge, and casual dining table.The master suite opens directly to the upper terrace and includes a king bed and deluxe ensuite bathroom with jetted tub. On the ground floor, the large junior suite opens to the pool terrace and also features a jetted tub in its bathroom, set within a lovely niche. Two other guestrooms—one with king bed, one with two queen beds—share a bathroom between them. The spacious media room has two queen-size sofa beds.Villa del Mar offers one of the finest possible locations at Playa del Carmen, within walking distance of the beach, a spa, tennis courts, and the town's famous Quinta Avenida. The community also includes two excellent golf courses, as well as extraordinary Mayan ruins that guests are free to explore.Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
