listing.listing_description: Indulge in a tropical holiday in this lavish home, set upon the edge of a ridge along the West Coast—it’s one of our top villas in Barbados. You’ll experience touches of luxury from the moment you step on the grounds. A playground for the rich and famous, Barbados is an ideal gateway for visitors pursuing the sun, fine dining and high-end shopping.Sink into one of the cushioned lounge chairs under a sun umbrella on the back deck; you’ll find several facing the infinity-edge pool. From here, you can walk across a wooden bridge that sits over the pool and leads to a raised gazebo. This back terrace lights up at night, and along with a barbecue, it becomes a perfect spot for evening entertaining.Inside the villa, you’ll find comfortable living spaces with plush furnishings and features like a flatscreen television—the living area also opens up to the terrace allowing tropical breezes to flow through the home. The large kitchen comes fully equipped with modern appliances, although you won’t have to worry about cooking, a chef service is included with your stay. Enjoy meals out on the raised dining area with seating for 10.Alila’s four bedrooms can accommodate up to eight guests, including children, and each bedroom features a private, en-suite bathroom and air conditioning. The master suite encompasses the entire upper level and boasts a super king size bed and opulent bathroom along with an alfresco tub on a private patio. The remaining rooms include king, queen and twin beds.You’ll be a quick a five-minute drive to the beach and facilities at Sandy Lane Hotel. Meanwhile, the variety of dining and shopping options in Holetown are just seven minutes away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This villa’s name is a tribute to Soliman Bay, a hidden gem and one of the most protected bays along the Mayan Riviera. Villa Soliman is a place where visitors experience true simplicity and refinement, where everything slows down and the wristwatch becomes the sun in the sky once again. Here time reveals itself in the gentle passing of the clouds, the cool sea breeze and the colors of crystalline water. Come immerse yourself in the natural beauty of the gorgeous bay and unique serenity at Villa Soliman.Lounge in the swimming pool or relax next to it in the outdoor lounging area. With stunning ocean views right from your villa, and perfect lounging spots, you can hang out and bask in the sunshine all day long. Varieties of palm trees and tropical plants surrounding the infinity swimming pool create a heavenly environment. Your villa includes a rooftop terrace with hot tub, kayaks, snorkeling equipment, daily housekeeping service and a meet-and-greet.Sitting behind the sand dunes, Villa Soliman harmoniously integrates elements of nature into the design of the house. Inspired by the beauty of Soliman Bay, the interiors of the villa feature minimalist furnishing combined with a playful mix of soothing colors that reflect the laid-back, beachside lifestyle. Two fully equipped kitchens, two interior dining areas and two elegant living rooms create a dual living environment perfect for friends and families to get their space.This villa has six ocean view bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms and private terraces facing the ocean. Accommodating up to twelve guests, Villa Soliman is perfect for families, corporate retreats and diverse groups. Relax and unwind on the pristine linens and luxuriously comfortable beds to emerge rejuvenated and refreshed each new morning.Nestled on a sandy beach with palm trees looking out over the crystal blue Caribbean, this truly inviting Mayan Riviera beachfront villa offers a spectacular experience. Activities on Soliman Bay include swimming, snorkeling, kayaking and diving, all accessible from the white sand beach. Enjoy the stunning natural beauty of Mexico and relax in your home away from home at Villa Soliman!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

listing.listing_description: In Pointe Milou, just 7 km from the airport, you’ll find this well-appointed home, recently renovated, and offering up some of the best sunset views of all our St. Barts villas. The island of St. Barts, with its perpetual sunshine, offers some of the top restaurants in the Caribbean as well as some of the best shopping around.Enjoy stunning views of the sea while lounging on one of the sun chairs on the tiled terrace. They surround the infinity-edge pool, a refreshing way to cool down on hot days. This backyard space also includes an outdoor seating area and a barbecue for an evening of casual dining. Those who need to stay connected can take advantage of the Wi-Fi access.Within the home, the decor is contemporary and features an open-design concept. The living room opens up to terrace and offers views of the sea, plush sofas, glass coffee tables and a zebra-print area rug. Vaulted ceilings with fans keeps things cool, while the nearby equipped kitchen is loaded with gadgets to make cold drinks, including an ice maker, blender and a beverage fridge.The villa’s three bedrooms overlook the sea and can accommodate up to six guests—all offer en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning as well as televisions with DVD players. Two rooms include queen-sized beds while the third bedroom’s two twin beds can be converted into a queen bed.The beach closest to this charming home is Lorient, a reef-protected spot with calm waters perfect for swimming. This spot tends to be less crowded than some of the other, better-known beaches. Meanwhile, the island’s capital, Gustavia, is just 7.4 km away. Here you’ll find plenty of sightseeing attractions as well as diverse restaurants, boutiques and gift shops.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa del Mar offers you unsurpassed luxury and comfort in the magical beachfront setting of Belizean Cove Estates. There’s no escaping the picture-perfect unobstructed view of Ambergris Caye and the sparkling Caribbean.Exceptional Villa Del Mar commands an enviable upper floor view and features expansive vaulted ceilings in many of the rooms, adding to the airy and spacious feeling of this marvelous apartment. All around you are those wonderful views of the Caribbean Sea and Belize’s famous barrier reef, tantalizingly close. Copious windows and doors and outside spaces, including private balconies, terraces and verandahs mean you can easily let the outside in or step into the Belize climate and soak up those fabulous vistas. Luxuriously and comfortably equipped Villa Del Mar features custom designed furniture from Bali, antique carved wood panels, and the colorful artwork of prominent Belizean artists such as Walter Castillo. Your apartment truly reflects Belizean culture but still provides you all the luxuries and comforts of home. There’s a great deal to keep you entertained, including a gourmet kitchen, cable television, Internet, LCD television with movie collection and stereo system, all air-cooled by ceiling fans and air conditioning.Set in the tropical oasis of Belizean Cove Estates there’s everything you need to maximize outdoor living. The Estate’s wonderful and impeccable pool area perfectly frames your view of the Caribbean. Here you can start your day with a dip in the pool, soak your cares away in the hot tub or wander down to the beach and take time out in a sea kayak, the perfect way to explore the Caye.Your three restful and elegantly furnished bedrooms all include en-suite bathrooms. For your utmost comfort all beds are topped with a pillow top mattress and fine luxurious bed linens and all rooms are furnished with television, air conditioning and ceiling fan. Your deluxe en-suite bathrooms also feature jetted tubs and opulent marble finishes.Villa del Mar truly is an exceptional apartment in an ideal location to enjoy the largest of Belize’s islands. San Pedro Town is just 3 miles away and just one mile to the tennis and basketball courts. The famous coral reef, the second largest in the world, runs the entire length of this magical island._ Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach. _Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Situated within the Sian Ka'an Biosphere Preserve at Tulum, this extraordinary beachfront villa offers a unique and unforgettable experience of Mexico's Riviera Maya. The five-acre estate is poised between the Caribbean Sea and Caapchen Lagoon, with three hundred feet of frontage on both sides and breathtaking views in all directions. Designed by the renowned Mexican architectural group De Yturbe, the solar-powered home gracefully fuses interior and outdoor living, blending contemporary lines, fine natural materials, high-end amenities, and touches of fine artwork. Four superb bedrooms suites accommodate up to eight guests, ideal for families with children. Your villa experience includes a talented private staff, and the Full Board vacation rental package features an outstanding private cook among other deluxe services.Expansive outdoor spaces invite you savor the pristine beauty of Sian Ka'an (an ancient Mayan name meaning "where the sky is born"). The rooftop gazes out across sublime vistas of the lagoon, jungle, and sea, with a double infinity pool and a canopied deck with lounge and dining table. On the main level of the home, beautiful wooden verandas hover amid the lush foliage and dreamy views. The pristine beach and vibrant sea are just steps away, where guests can snorkel, swim, or kayak across the turquoise expanse.Broad vanishing walls join the verandas to the main interior living area, infusing the home with enchanting views and breezes. The open-concept space includes beautiful sitting and dining areas beside a fully equipped gourmet kitchen. The villa is child-friendly and includes baby equipment, Wi-Fi, iPod docking stations, and a home theater.Each of the four bedrooms at Casa Ikal features an ensuite bathroom, air conditioning, ceiling fans, and a TV. The master suite enjoys a deluxe ensuite bathroom with a carved stone tub beside a garden-view window. The two queen bedrooms enjoy private balconies, and the kid-friendly fourth bedroom has two twin-size beds.Casa Ikal enjoys a prime location amid some of the greatest natural and cultural splendors of the Yucatan. Named a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 1987, Bian Sa'an is world-renowned for its pristine forests and beaches, extraordinary biodiversity, and Mayan archeological sites. Eco-adventures and sporting activates abound, including fishing, kite boarding, diving, and golf.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

listing.listing_description: Sunset views without and warm teak within give Samsara a golden glow. Set above the ocean in the Pointe Milou area of St. Barts, this west-facing contemporary vacation rental makes the most of its location with welcoming indoor-outdoor living areas. Two suite-style bedrooms are the perfect alternative to a resort for couples on holiday together or a relaxed tropical honeymoon.The calm expanse of Lorient Bay stretches out beneath this oceanfront luxury property. Folding walls open the front of the house to a spacious deck, where an infinity pool and row of loungers invite you to take in the views at your leisure. As the sun sinks toward the water, heat up the barbecue, set the mood with the sound system and sit down to dinner with the brilliant sky as your backdrop.Inspired by traditional Balinese villas, the interiors of Samsara use warm-hued Java teak for a welcoming feel. Not only does the influence show up in the great room’s beamed ceilings and polished floors, it’s also in the sitting area’s low, spacious sectional and carved accent pieces. A yellow feature wall is a playful pop of color that’s matched by the sofa cushions. The adjacent dining area isn’t quite outside, but gets a definite al-fresco feel from the fold-back walls, and in the fully equipped kitchen, beautiful granite counters draw their rich blue tones from the sea outside.Both bedrooms at Samsara have a queen bed, en-suite bathroom and ocean views, so it’s not hard to choose between the two. The only differences: one opens to a private terrace with lounge furniture, and the other opens to a tucked-away outdoor shower.Both a hotspot for the glamorous set and a favorite with celebrities on family vacation, St. Barts is at once chic and laid-back. A stay at Samsara lets you see both sides, with three gorgeous beaches a short drive away boasting the island’s famous white sands and clear waters, as well as the Colombier Beach Trail. A 7.1 km drive will bring you to excellent restaurants and lively nightlife, and a 20-minute drive puts you in the center of the designer boutiques of downtown Gustavia.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Na'iik is a stunning vacation rental that will leave you mesmerized as you drift through its open rooms and spacious outdoor spaces. Feel the soft sea breeze while taking in the charming views of the Sian Kaan coastline and lush tropical jungle. Quiet and secluded, this private seafront retreat located in Tulum along the Mayan Riviera is the perfect antidote to the stress of modern life.Step outside and enjoy the many terraces at this upscale villa. With a drink in your hand and the wind in your hair, enjoy the stunning sunsets from the spectacular rooftop while you splash in the infinity pool with a “looking glass” bottom. Other outdoor features at Na'iik include an alfresco dining set for twelve, hammocks and sun beds. For some fun in the water, head to the private beach with the villa’s kayaks and snorkeling gear. The indoor perks at Na'iik are perfectly suited for the modern family. Enjoy a movie on the Home theatre overhead projection system and make use of the sound system, Wi-Fi and yoga mats.This contemporary villa represents a fusion of Caribbean design and a sensibility for avant-garde luxury that creates a stylish beach hideaway par excellence. The living and dining areas offer an open plan and a stellar view of the Caribbean. The modern kitchen is fully equipped. You will be pampered by the professional staff; concierge, butler, chef, housekeeper, and groundskeeper are all included.Four breathtaking bedrooms accommodate up to eight adults and four children. All of the bedrooms provide en-suite bathrooms, king size beds, dual vanities, Sky TV, air conditioning, ceiling fans and hammocks. The two sea view suites offer stunning turquoise views and stone bath tub. Every suite has a day bed perfect to accomodate a child. Get the rest and relaxation you deserve with Luxury Retreats!Optimal for family reunions or luxurious weddings, Na'iik provides every perk to make this a truly memorable vacation in the sun. Enjoy the pleasure of a private beach, or take a short ride to one of the Mayan Riviera’s nearby cenotes, aqua parks or mayan ruins. In Tulum, you can discover a lively seaside town with excellent restaurants and shopping. In Playa del Carmen, you will find an exciting nightlife and top level golf courses. Enjoy the vacation of a lifetime at this exquisite residence in the heart of the Mexican Caribbean!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

listing.listing_description: Let your body and spirit blossom at Villa La Semilla. This incredible Riviera Maya vacation rental, whose name translates to “the seed,” is designed to both nurture and pamper, with lush jungle surroundings, a private stretch of beach, and an attentive staff. Bring up to ten family and friends for a relaxing, rejuvenating holiday at this luxury property.Villa La Semilla is staffed by a cook who prepares three meals each day, a concierge who can help arrange activities, a housekeeper and a gardener. A palm-lined courtyard welcomes guests, and the villa opens to a tranquil oceanfront garden with an infinity pool, lounging and dining areas, and an outdoor kitchen with a barbecue and wood-fired oven. Two rooftop terraces, one of which has a pool, let you soak in the sun by day and watch for shooting stars at night.This one-of-a-kind home pairs contemporary architecture with rustic-chic interiors. Wood ceiling beams, slipcovered sofas and a weathered wood dining table give the open-plan great room a welcoming, farmhouse-inspired feel, while sliding glass doors and a stunning glass roof open the space to the outdoors. Though cook service is included in your stay, the villa also has a fully equipped kitchen.Each of the five bedrooms at Villa La Semilla has an en-suite bathroom and a private balcony with ocean views and a tempting hammock. There are three bedrooms with king beds, including a master bedroom to rival any honeymoon suite, and two bedrooms with two double beds each. Whitewashed floors and ceilings and macrame-style throws lend the bedrooms a breezy, relaxed feel, while pieces like tufted sofas, carved headboards and crystal chandeliers add touches of unexpected glamour.The villa’s location on quiet Soliman Bay gives guests postcard-worthy views and easy access to the beach. Take the provided kayaks out on the water, or pedal around the villa’s gated community on the bicycles. Be sure to visit the Tulum ruins, just a 15-minute drive away, book a tee time at the Riviera Maya Golf Course, and sample the famed nightlife in Playa del Carmen.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

listing.listing_description: This spectacular oceanfront villa in St. Martin is located within Terrasse de Cul de Sac, within minutes of Orient Beach, Anse Beach Club, and Hope Estate. Newly renovated, the villa features a private boat dock and breathtaking views of the Caribbean Sea and Pinel Island. Ample alfresco living and dining spaces along with exquisite interiors set the stage for an unforgettable island escape, while six deluxe bedrooms (all with ensuite bathrooms) comfortably accommodate families, groups of friends, and destination wedding guests.Savor dreamy days in the Caribbean sun, floating in the infinite swimming pool, sipping cool cocktails on elegant loungers or sumptuous sunbeds, and beholding the sublime ocean views. Launch your boat or kayak onto the vast expansive of scintillating sea, and return to a delicious barbeque at the alfresco table. At sunset and at night, linger outdoors in the lanai's ample lounge, relishing the dreamy island breeze.An open wall joins the lanai and the interior living areas, allowing you to savor the ocean's enchanting presence all evening long. Adjacent indoor and alfresco living areas form an expansive, seamless space for entertaining guests. The luminous gourmet kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances, and one of its windows serves as the lanai's bar. Beside the kitchen, a lovely table is perfect for morning coffee or breakfast. The décor is exquisite in both the lanai and the interior, with gallery-worthy artwork and a bright yet cool palette that echoes the spirit of the sea.The villa includes six extraordinary bedrooms, all with ensuite bathrooms and furnished terrace areas, providing wonderfully placid privates spaces for downtime and rest. Five of the suites feature king beds and one has two twin-size bunk beds. Four of the six bedrooms enjoy ocean views.Mapai balances exquisite seaside privacy with easy access to nearby beaches, dining, and nightlife. The center of Cul de Sac is within walking distance, where you'll find dining options; there is also excellent dining and nightlife at nearby Orient Bay, Grade Case, and Hope Estate, with its renowned Bacchus restaurant. Anse Marcel Beach Club and Orient Beach area also just minutes away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note that there is construction near the villa. Please enquire with one of our Villa Specialists for further details.This Grand Cayman villa looks onto the brilliant blue water of a peaceful Cayman cove. With a brilliant white exterior and welcoming sun terrace, a sense of maritime serenity runs through this modern property. Relax into a poolside sun chair as yachts glide slowly by, making your plans for a sunny beach day, diving trip to a remote and enchanting coral reef, or a visit to charming George Town.The blue and white terrace of this villa mirrors the colors of the Caribbean sky above, resulting in a relaxing mirror image that helps to lull guests into a tranquil state. The upper level of the villa provides a perfect view of the still waters of the cove beyond, while the airy and shaded interior provides a refreshing contrast with the sun-drenched island outside. The light color scheme of the villa’s rooms are broken by arresting splashes of colorful decor, while the welcoming sofas and easy chairs are ideal for guests looking to settle in for a comfortable afternoon. With a fully outfitted kitchen, groups will have all the facilities they need to cater for a delightful stay at this enchanting location.Located on Rum Point, along a quiet stretch of the north coast of Grand Cayman, this villa offers an excellent combination of peace and quiet, plus easy access to the entirety of the island. From the nearby harbour, step on board a chartered yacht for a refreshing cruise along the coast with the Carribbean breeze propelling you on your way. Make an outing to a pleasant beach bar for a refreshing afternoon cocktail, or visit the nearby botanical gardens for a fascinating insight into the island’s local ecology. A visit to one of the island’s many gorgeous beaches is always an option, while the bright lights, renowned grill bars and pleasant restaurants of George Town are just a short drive away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.Casa Reposada is a spectacular five-bedroom home within the Encanto de la Laguna community in Los Cabos, just steps from the beach and six miles from downtown San José del Cabo. Built in a vintage colonial style with terracotta roof tile, luminous white facades, and rich natural wood accents, the villa comprises 3,970 square feet of interior living space and 3,000 square feet of outdoor terraces with stunning views of the Sea of Cortez.Multiple alfresco lounges and dining tables invite you to enchanting days and evenings in the Pacific breeze. On the lower terrace, savor a delicious soak in the elevated hot tub and plunge into the sparkling pool. Sunbathe in the brilliant light and withdraw into the shaded pavilion for afternoon tapas and cocktails. Kindle the fire pit in the evening and warm your bellies with classic Mexican refreshments. A lovely spiral staircase leads to the upper terrace, which offers a second fire pit, dining table, and privileged ocean views.Pocket doors fuse the pool terrace with the villa's interior, inhaling the ocean breeze into the home. The open-concept living area includes an ample sofa facing a mounted TV, a beautiful rustic table, and a gourmet kitchen with a long bar seating six. The kitchen harmonizes rich wooden cabinetry with chef-grade, stainless steel appliances, while the living area blends fresh white wall finishes with earthy, antique accents like exposed wood beams and a stone column. A separate media room welcomes cozy downtime.All five bedroom suites feature king beds, air conditioning, and ensuite bathrooms. The master suite enjoys a private balcony, sublime ocean views, a walk-in closet, and a soaking tub in its deluxe bathroom. The second bedroom enjoys a private balcony as well, while a guest bedroom is detached from the main house, offering extra privacy.The villa offers a fine balance of privacy amid the myriad resorts and pleasures of Los Cabos. About two hundred feet form the beach at Encanto de la Laguna, you're also just five minutes by car from the Puerto Los Cabos Marina and fifteen minutes from the colonial beauty of San Jose del Cabo. Golfers are five minutes from Puerto Los Cabos Golf Course, while other world-class fairways are in easy reach.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: La Bella Casa is a charming Caribbean estate surrounded by lush tropical gardens and sprawling green lawns. The views overlooking elegant La Samanna Hotel, Baie Longue Beach and the deep blue Caribbean dazzle morning to night. Sunsets are magical paintings in hot pinks and orange; a colorful backdrop for cocktail hour. Featuring 12 bedrooms, the villa is a perfect setting for large families, groups of friends or weddings. Although spacious, it has an intimate feel. You can be together or quite private.The interior and exterior décor is an exotic mix of Indonesian and French style. Neutral shades of white and cream are accented with pops of color in every room. Soft grey tiles run throughout. The exterior terraces and covered verandahs on the upper and lower level provide multiple spaces for relaxing and dining. The new terrace furniture is modern blending beautifully with the sea and large blue pool set in the center of the upper terrace. For fun, a ping pong table sits under a verandah. Throughout the villa, arches and iron work add design interest.The interior great room is very spacious and casually elegant, perfect for gathering. Sliding glass pocket doors open the room to the view and breezes. New contemporary furniture in the living room include the colours of the sea & sky and complement the rest of the interiors. The soaring ceilings are popped with blue trim, a design theme repeated throughout the villa. The pretty French Country kitchen in blue and white Provence tiles features a stunning French stove and beautiful views. A barbeque sits just off the kitchen.Seven bedrooms are in the main house. Each has private outdoor seating with either garden or ocean views. The overall mood in each room mixes Provence colours and fabrics in white with blue, yellow or red. Most rooms feature romantic four poster beds. Each en-suite bathroom is tiled in the iconic Provence tiles found in many Terres Basses villas. Several have ocean or garden views from the walk-in showers. A very large suite on the lower level is a quiet oasis with its own large terrace and seating both inside and outside. The villa also has a fitness room.There are also 3 detached suites, offering a bit of extra privacy for members of your group. One cottage has two king size beds with ensuite bathroom, while the other has a king, 2 twin beds and a private bathroom. Lastly, a studio apartment below the main house has a queen size bed, private living quarters and a kitchenette, making it the ideal space for any staff members that might traveling with you.You are well located, 8 minutes to the French capital of Marigot, with its shops, restaurants, markets and galleries. In the opposite direction, you are only 10 minutes to the international airport of Princess Juliana (SXM). Grand Case and Philipsburg are also only 30-minutes away.
